title: @KateyKhaos Heartseeker Ashe missing SFX
body: After Ashe got her mini-rework, she lost her special auto attack sounds on Heartseeker and now has the default classic one. Could this be fixed please? I really enjoyed them.

replies.body:
Hey Oerba Star, 

*(Super sorry for the late reply on this one - I've been talking with folks about this.)*

The sound you're referring to was connected to her old (Q), Frost Shot. With her update, we changed that skill to Ranger's Focus, which isn't a toggle ability. That said, we're talking to the audio bros to see if there's something we can do to re-incorporate this sound into her updated kit, since it's something the skin originally had. 

I'd be happy to update this thread again when I have a bit more information on the resolution we go with! ^-^

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=vJkVr3ui,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-09T17:29:30.412+0000)
>
> Hey Oerba Star, 
> 
> *(Super sorry for the late reply on this one - I've been talking with folks about this.)*
> 
> The sound you're referring to was connected to her old (Q), Frost Shot. With her update, we changed that skill to Ranger's Focus, which isn't a toggle ability. That said, we're talking to the audio bros to see if there's something we can do to re-incorporate this sound into her updated kit, since it's something the skin originally had. 
> 
> I'd be happy to update this thread again when I have a bit more information on the resolution we go with! ^-^

Do you have anymore details on this?

Hey Oerba Star,

I do have an update!

After discussion, we decided that it wasn't cool that the kit change caused a unique sound to be removed from the skin. Because of this, we're adding it back into the skin and giving it to her auto attacks. The change won't be in patch 5.21, as it just came out today, but it'll be hitting live soon. ^-^ Thanks for your patience with this issue!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=vJkVr3ui,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-29T21:06:42.447+0000)
>
> Hey Oerba Star,
> 
> I do have an update!
> 
> After discussion, we decided that it wasn't cool that the kit change caused a unique sound to be removed from the skin. Because of this, we're adding it back into the skin and giving it to her auto attacks. The change won't be in patch 5.21, as it just came out today, but it'll be hitting live soon. ^-^ Thanks for your patience with this issue!

Thanks a ton<3
You're welcome! Hope this resolves the issue.
